title: ABM Platforms Integrate AI Intent Signals to Shorten Industrial Sales Cycles by 30%
summary: Account-based marketing platforms like 6sense and Demandbase use AI-derived intent data to identify in-market industrial buyers earlier, compressing traditionally long B2B sales cycles.

title: Siemens and GE Vernova Invest in Digital Experience Platforms for B2B Buyers
summary: Industrial giants modernize their digital buyer journeys with self-service portals, AI-powered product configurators, and personalized content hubs to match B2C-level experience expectations.

title: Trade Show Marketing Gets an AI Upgrade: Predictive Lead Scoring at the Booth
summary: Industrial marketers deploy AI-powered badge scanning and conversation analysis at trade shows to score leads in real time, routing high-intent prospects to sales reps within minutes.

title: LinkedIn's B2B Advertising Revenue Surges 40% on AI-Powered Targeting Updates
summary: LinkedIn reports record B2B ad revenue as new AI-driven targeting features help industrial and enterprise marketers reach decision-makers with greater precision and lower CPLs.

title: Manufacturing Brands Embrace Video Marketing, Seeing 3x Engagement Over Whitepapers
summary: B2B manufacturers shift content strategy toward short-form video explainers and virtual facility tours, discovering that video content drives triple the engagement of traditional PDF whitepapers.
